subject: Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: A 21-year-old man who intentionally vomited on a spectator and his 11-year-old daughter at a Philadelphia Phillies game was sentenced to up to three months in jail and community service.
snippet: A 21-year-old man who intentionally vomited on a spectator and his 11-year-old daughter at a Philadelphia Phillies game was sentenced to up to three months in jail and community service.
